mapper.select: SELECT POINT_FINAL FROM( SELECT POINT_FINAL FROM POINTS WHERE USER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY PRO_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUP_NAME , COUP_PRICE FROM( SELECT COUP_NAME, COUP_PRICE FROM COUPON WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND COUP_USE = '가능' AND COUP_LIMIT > SYSDATE ) WHERE ROWNUM <=3

SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.SEL_SEQ, A.PRO_SEQ, A.SEL_NUM, A.SEL_TIME, A.FINAL_PRICE, C.PRO_NAME, A.DEL_SEQ, A.SEL_SIZE, A.SEL_COLOR, B.DEL_STEP, C.SUB_ITEM FROM SALES A JOIN DELIVERY B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.PRO_SEQ=B.PRO_SEQ JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.PRO_SEQ = C.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY A.SEL_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.PRO_SEQ, B.PRO_NAME, A.QNA_TITLE, A.QNA_STEP, A.QNA_TIME FROM QNA A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRO_SEQ = B.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id} ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.REV_SEQ, B.PRO_NAME, A.REV_TITLE, A.SCORE, A.REV_TIME FROM REVIEW A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRO_SEQ = B.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id} ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.PRO_NAME, B.PRO_PRICE, A.PRO_SIZE, A.COLOR, A.BAS_PRO_NUM, B.SUB_ITEM FROM BASKET A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRO_SEQ = B.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY A.BAS_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
